name: CAT-ASTROPHE (ArkarPhyo)
description:
A stray cat has decided to make chaos in the homes of a peaceful city. He sneaks into the houses when there's no one inside and turn everything upside down before house owners come back.


Controls

W, A, S, D - to move

Space - to jump

E - to interact destroyable objects

R - to drop poop bomb!

This game is made for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2

Theme "LET THERE BE CHAOS"
